::Zardus::

Zardus raises an eyebrow as another pod registers on the scanners. 
Many new bots lately.

"Burning Hammer," he says into his comm, "Can you go get the new pod 
that just landed and bring the bot back to me?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: First group to approach this one will gain a loyal addition.
> 
> ::Lambda::
>     Her stasis pod landed in South America.  It was an uneventful 
landing and 
> all the systems were still working.  The only unusual thing was 
that it 
> landed in a field of living llamas.  It didn't crush them or 
anything, they 
> were just there.  The bot inside the pod had been altered as it was 
now 
> transmetal.  With all of these llamas around it is no surprise that 
it's 
> beast mode was that of a llama.
